top_comments.comment: I personally believe the present Head Football Coach of the University of Cincinnati Bearcats Football Program would be an Excellent Choice as the next Head Football Coach of the University of Southern California Trojans Football Program at Los Angeles, California.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I personally believe the present Head Football Coach of the University of Cincinnati Bearcats Football Program would be an Excellent Choice as the next Head Football Coach of the University of Southern California Trojans Football Program at Los Angeles, California.
